properties.title: DPML Station Appliance Virtual Machine Process Descriptor

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Definition of a virtual machine process.

tr.td: The startup timeout value. The default value is 0 (uncondition wait).
The shutdown timeout value. The default value is 0 (uncondition wait).
An absolute or relative path defining the basedir for deployment of the Java Virtual Machine. The default value is the current derectory of the application executing the deployment process.
AThe name of the executable to use for deployment. The default value is the metro application.
Declaration of environment variable assertions to be applied to the virtual machine on creation.
Zero or more system property assertions to be assigned to the Java Virtual Machine on creation.
Zero or more command line arguments to be supplied to the virtual machine on creation.
